amendment.description: Amendment sought to require registered lobbyists to disclose any honoraria they pay to members of the media.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to require registered lobbyists to disclose any honoraria they pay to members of the media.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weller amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 233 (Roll no. 827).
